pageContext.claim: “Republicans are rebuilding our country. We believe in the dignity of work, the power of freedom, and we believe in the truth of our national motto, which a lot of people don't like using. Did you see some court ruled against it the other day? 'In God we trust.'”
pageContext.analysis: There has been no recent ruling against "In God we trust" at the time Trump made these remarks. Rather, courts ruled in favor of it both before and after his speech.
